snippet: Louis Oosthuizen sank a 35-foot birdie putt on the 17th hole to top a fellow South African, Tjaart van der Walt, and retain his title at the Africa Open in East London, South Africa.
lead_paragraph: Louis Oosthuizen sank a 35-foot birdie putt on the 17th hole to top a fellow South African, Tjaart van der Walt, and retain his title at the Africa Open in East London, South Africa.
